title: Gluten free lemon cupcakes
ingredients: ['150ml milk, at room temperature', '3 3/4 teaspoons lemon juice', '60ml vegetable oil', '2 egg whites, room temperature', '2 lemons, zested', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '155g gluten free plain flour', '150g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons gluten free baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
